biotools.summary: Weighted MAXimum Clique. Method for identifying condition specific sub-network. Reveals a subset of genes which are closely related to a particular disease. It integrates gene expression data and protein-protein interaction information to construct molecular network, and then extracts the most density connected sub-network using an integration of a global search method and efficient projection procedure.
